page.title: 15GARDEN FETE
page.content: Ever since the school was built in 1951, we have had a garden fete. The P.T.A hold the garden fete on the first Saturday in June. The day before, Mr Moxon, the headmaster hands out magic tickets to the people who have sold the most tickets,for the prize draw and the most programmes, so they can have a go on everything. Every year we have a different theme, this year it was music. This year, we had the school orchestra, the Highland Pipers,the Loughborough Town band,and the Boys Brigade band. In the arena we had maypole dancing,the high jump, and other events.
